data.englishTranslation: There is not any slave of Allah who commits a sin, then he perfects his ablution and stands to pray two rak'ah of prayer, then seeks Allah's forgiveness, except that Allah will forgive him.
data.arabicVerse: مَا مِنْ عَبْدٍ يُذْنِبُ ذَنْباً فَيُحْسِنُ الطُّهُورَ، ثُمَّ يَقُومُ فَيُصَلِّي رَكْعَتَيْنِ، ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرُاللهَ إلَّا غَفَرَ اللهُ لَهُ
